name: Knightly Chess
description:
Knightly Chess is a new take on an old classic, where the King is defenseless but is given a knight move when in check.  This fast-paced game is great to play among friends.  Make sure you read the rules before playing and I hope you enjoy :)

The Team: Christian Gutierrez, Bowei Han, Javier Martin, Sergey Mysin, Jake Roberts
